remarks: Letterwise operations on word concatenations.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 28-Sep-2018.)
statement:
ofccat.1 $e |- ( ph -> E e. Word S ) $.
ofccat.2 $e |- ( ph -> F e. Word S ) $.
ofccat.3 $e |- ( ph -> G e. Word T ) $.
ofccat.4 $e |- ( ph -> H e. Word T ) $.
ofccat.5 $e |- ( ph -> ( # ` E ) = ( # ` G ) ) $.
ofccat.6 $e |- ( ph -> ( # ` F ) = ( # ` H ) ) $.
ofccat $p |- ( ph -> ( ( E concat F ) oF R ( G concat H ) ) = ( ( E oF R G ) concat ( F oF R H ) ) ) $.
